page.title: 07Shepshed's New Industries
page.content: Prior to the building of the{M.1. {motorway,}industry in{Shepshed}was based on traditional crafts such as {hosiery}and{boot and shoe {manufacturing.}There was a granite quarry which was in a state of decline. The construction of the M.1. had the immediate effect of rejuvenating work at the quarry because of the need for hardcore. Since that time the area to the south_west of Shepshed has developed into an{industrial area.}Work at the granite quarry has expanded to include {readymix concrete}and a{tile making {works.}Proximity to the M.1 has atttracted other industries, including a regional office of the{electricity {board,}distributive warehouse for Mattel toys and small units for{light {engineering.}Unfortunately it has also brought environmental problems.
